name: Levis 501 Jeans - Women's
description: Slip into a little timeless cool. The iconic 501 jean helped put Levi’s on the map.Classic 5-pocket layout.Relaxed through the hip, sits at natual waist.Comfortable straight legTime tested button-up fly.Levi’s sources more than 17% of its cotton through the Better Cotton Initiative (BCI). The BCI is a not-for-profit association committed to a holistic approach to sustainable cotton production.
